Table.Description:
Water (Supply) Nymph
A nymph was booted from her home, and has taken up residence in the party's water supply. If they try to drink from her "home" she will get revenge. She is willing to come to a deal, for instance leaving their water if they kill the fey that stole her home.
Curse of the Stone-Pixie (See notes in Wode Encounters.txt)
Magic Parasite Infestation (See notes in Wode Encounters.txt)

Stinging vines - vines like jellyfish tentacles that sting prey - this attracts scavengers who eat the dead organism - decaying organism + poop from scavenger fertilizes the plant soil - weird magical effect - some wode folk harvest these vines to use as weapons, fashioned into whips
Coral-like animal that filter feeds on magic in the air, host vibrant ecosystems much like actual coral
Ambush predator that attaches to tree branches and dangles down poisonous tentacles disguised as vines, trivial to kill, so not an actual fight
Mundane Hazard (https://imgur.com/P3EfJYB or C:\Users\prest\Documents\Dungeons and Dragons\Misc\Natural Features.png)
